text: Citibank Russia () is a Russian commercial bank, which is part of the financial corporation Citigroup. ==Branches & ATMs== Citibank Russia has branches and ATMs present in Moscow, St.Petersburg, Ekaterinburg, Nizhniy Novgorod, Rostov-on-Don, Samara, and Ufa. However their branch network is expected to decline to 15 from 22 by the end of 2019. ==See also== *List of banks in Russia == References == ==External links== *Citibank Russia Website Category:Citigroup Category:Russia stubs
title: Citibank Russia
